title: I Thought It Was Forbidden
content:
She remains alive at the end of her arc.

After losing his Sharingan in the finale, Kakashi has developed a new technique to replace the Chidori/Raikiri

while the spell can destroy anything, it may very well destroy EVERYTHING.
